messages.message:
More feedback/suggestions:
• Members of the same enterprise should be able to share a conversation (by link and by +user) so more than one user can collaborate and converse with a document at the same time
• It would be nice to have constant drag and drop functionality for file upload, so second, third, etc files can be easily added after a conversation is started
• Beyond drag and drop, we should also have the ability to copy/paste a screenshot or url
